channel.name: CW Boston US
channel.title: The Verdict With Judge Hatchett
channel.desc: A woman sues her stepmother over a baby grand piano; a cosmetologist seeks compensation after a photoshoot.

channel.name: CW Boston US
channel.title: Justice for All With Judge Cristina P?rez
channel.desc: An influencer blames a photographer for a lost brand deal because "before" photos were posted online; a man and his mom's ex-boyfriend argue over plane tickets.

channel.name: CW Boston US
channel.title: Forensic Files
channel.desc: A coroner finds telltale clues on the badly burned body of a murder victim, sending police in pursuit of a couple of killers.

channel.name: CW Boston US
channel.title: Lauren Lake's Paternity Court
channel.desc: A single mother wants to prove to a married man that he is the father of her infant.
